title: Bug 114905 - Default value set in list box of report parameter lost after modifying the default value
description: The default value set in the list box of a report parameter is lost after modifying the default value.
OB: When a report parameter with the display type of List Box is created and the default value is set, modifying the default value causes it to be lost.
EB: The default value should remain unchanged after modifying it in the Edit Parameter dialog for a report parameter with the display type of List Box.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Create a report parameter with the display type set to List Box. 
2. Input three values: 'aa', 'bb', 'cc', and set 'aa' as the default value. 
3. Click OK. 
4. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog. 
5. Modify 'aa' to 'aaa' and click OK. 
6. Reopen the Edit Parameter dialog to verify.
